about_the_game:
Thanks to the interest shown by the community regarding The Alien Cube Behind the scenes DLC, it is now available a similar DLC also for The Land of Pain.
There will be unseen screenshots taken from old under-development builds, removed content, and my very first project never published.

This DLC unlocks a folder inside the game location that contains:

  • Screenshots of under development builds of The Land of Pain.
  • A sneak peek of my first CryEngine Project.
  • Removed content from The Land of Pain's final build like the "Scientist Lab".
  • A short video.
  • Wallpapers.

To access the DLC:
Right click the game in your Steam Library -> Manage -> Browse Local Files

Thank you for supporting the developer!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Gore, General Mature Content
